message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.GR 

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision tasks, specifically edge detection, and proposes a novel refinement architecture to improve the accuracy of ConvNet-based edge detectors. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves deep learning techniques, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper proposes a new architecture, which could fall under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper discusses the benefits of crisp edge maps for several computer vision applications, which could also place it under cs.GR (Graphics).
